about_the_game:
This DLC will add 4 new exclusive characters with unique perks :


  • Salim: Logistics expert: Reduces workloads by 2% on all actions.
After working for about 15 years in the retail trade sector, Salim switched profession and went into sustainable farming.
He loves to optimize everything and intends to prove that a good organization can handle any challenges.

  • Mélanie: Scientist: Your first 2 searches take twice as less time (rounded up).
A retired climatologist, Mélanie has always had green thumbs. She also enjoys spending time reading scientific studies.

  • Sarah: Business Savvy: All the sale prices of your products increase by 2%.
A business school graduate who’s fresh off training as a farmer, Sarah knows the rules of the agrifood market and is not afraid to negotiate with big fish !

  • Antoine: Former insurance agent : Reduces the cost of insurance by 50%.
Antoine met many farmers by selling them insurance, which made him want to try farming for himself! Of course, he keeps a preferential rate on his own insurance!

BUY A DLC = SAVE THE BEES


Because Roots of Tomorrow is a game about agroecology, it was important to us to support the preservation of biodiversity.

This is why part of the income generated by the sales these DLCs will be donated to the non profit “Un toit pour les abeilles” (“A roof for bees”)

“Un Toit Pour Les Abeilles” is a network of nearly a hundred beekeepers who campaign for artisanal, local and bee-friendly beekeeping. For more than 10 years, the beekeepers of the network have been committed to safeguarding the bee, in particular through the sponsorship of beehives.
